SELECT a.id as agentId, a.company_name as companyName, COUNT(tb.booking_id) as totalBookings, SUM(CASE WHEN tb.status = 'completed' THEN tb.total_price ELSE 0 END) as totalRevenue, AVG(tb.total_price) as averageOrderValue FROM agents a LEFT JOIN tour_bookings tb ON a.id = tb.agent_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND tb.status IN ('confirmed', 'completed') GROUP BY a.id, a.company_name ORDER BY totalRevenue DESC LIMIT 10
